disp-quote.p: A315: There is another place but they never have medicine . When you go there they tell you that there are no drugs
A315: It is called *** health center .
Interviewer: It is a government hospital .
Interviewer: Health center three or two .
A315: Three but when you get there they tell you that they do not have drugs. You may get there and there are no health workers .

A317: “Yes, you need transport of 1500 plus it is painful…………..You find that there are no drugs, even panadol they don’t give you that is why we don’t go. So you would use that money and go to the clinic . ”
